definition: to shake/to flap/to vibrate/to resonate/to rise up with spirit/to rouse oneself
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: The seasonal sea level change is of annual period and the second oscillation is of semi-annual period.
sentences.chinese: 月平均海面以年周期振动为主，其次是半年周期。

sentences.english: A method of deriving linear model of 3-dimention hydraulic shaking system was presented.
sentences.chinese: 导出了三轴液压振动系统的线性化模型。

sentences.english: Accentric block vibrating mechanism is applied to break the earth for pile sinking pipe to set down.
sentences.chinese: 采用偏心块振动式机构，强迫振动土壤破裂下沉桩管。

sentences.english: Accentric block vibrating mechanism is applied to break the earth for pile sinking pipe to set down.
sentences.chinese: 采用偏心块振动式机构，强迫振动土壤破裂下沉桩管。

sentences.english: The linear density and unevenness of PET spun staple fiber were measured by vibration method.
sentences.chinese: 介绍用振动仪测试涤纶原丝线密度及其不匀率。

sentences.english: So the lattice has a bunch of vibrational energies.
sentences.chinese: 晶格有大量的振动能级。

sentences.english: The control for wind-induced vibration of long-span bridges was studied in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 本文主要研究大跨度桥梁风致振动控制。

sentences.english: Protection of your vibratory essence is vital.
sentences.chinese: 至关重要的是保护你们的振动精髓。

sentences.english: Vibrating mirror, light writing device, and image forming apparatus.
sentences.chinese: 振动镜，光写设备，以及成像装置。

sentences.english: The principle of a stand-up dynamic vibration injection machine is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了立式液压振动注射机的工作原理。

sentences.english: The calculation results of road excitation show that the vibration characteristics of the mini-truck model are obviously improved.
sentences.chinese: 路面激励的计算结果表明振动特性得到明显改善。

sentences.english: The excessive or insufficient silt-content is unfavorable to the vibrating consolidation of sandy soils.
sentences.chinese: 粉粒含量过多或太少均不利于砂土的振动固结。

sentences.english: Then the vortex-induced vibration response of cables is calculated.
sentences.chinese: 从而计算拖缆的涡激振动响应。

sentences.english: Celestite holds the vibration of underwater worlds in the language of light.
sentences.chinese: 天青石持有光之语中水下世界的振动。

sentences.english: The dynamic interaction between the maglev vehicle and the three-span rigid frame bridge is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 研究了磁浮车辆与三跨刚构桥之间的耦合振动。

sentences.english: The evolution of nonlinearities of vibrations of the shells is extensively investigated.
sentences.chinese: 这使此种壳体的非线性振动的进展获得扩充研究。

definition: to sway/to swing/to move back and forth/to oscillate
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
